00029 from Koo.Common import Common
00030 from Koo.Common import Icons
00031 from Koo.Common import Options
00032 from Koo import Rpc
00033 
00034 from FormView import FormView, FormContainer
00035 from Koo.View.AbstractParser import *
00036 from Koo.Fields.FieldWidgetFactory import *
00037 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldWidget import *
00038 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00039 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00040 
00041 
00042 class FormParser(AbstractParser):
00043 
00044         def create(self, viewId, parent, viewModel, node, fields, filter=None):
00045                 self.viewModel = viewModel
00046                 self.filter = filter
00047                 self.widgetList = []
00048                 self.context = parent.context
00049                 # Create the view
00050                 self.view = FormView( parent )
00051                 self.view.id = viewId
00052                 # Parse and fill in the view
00053                 container, onWriteFunction = self.parse( node, fields )
00054                 container.expand()
00055                 self.view.setWidget( container )
00056                 self.view.setOnWriteFunction( onWriteFunction )
00057                 return self.view
00058 
00059         def parse(self, root_node, fields, notebook=None, container=None):
00060                 attrs = Common.nodeAttributes(root_node)
00061                 onWriteFunction = attrs.get('on_write', '')
00062 
00063                 if container == None :
00064                         parent = self.view
00065                         if notebook:
00066                                 parent = notebook
00067                         # We want FormContainer parent to be the notebook for the case
00068                         # when it's a QTabWidget. This way FormContainer can enable/disable
00069                         # the tab when necessary.
00070                         container = FormContainer( parent, int(attrs.get('col',4)) )
00071                 
00072                 if not self.view.title:
00073                         self.view.title = attrs.get('string', 'Unknown')
00074 
00075                 for node in root_node.childNodes:
00076                         if not node.nodeType==node.ELEMENT_NODE:
00077                                 continue
00078                         attrs = Common.nodeAttributes(node)
00079                         if node.localName=='image':
00080                                 icon = QLabel(container)
00081                                 icon.setPixmap( Icons.kdePixmap(attrs['name']) ) 
00082                                 container.addWidget(icon, attrs)
00083 
00084                         elif node.localName=='separator':
00085                                 caption = attrs.get( 'string', '' )
00086 
00087                                 separator = QWidget( container )
00088                                 separator.setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy.Expanding, QSizePolicy.Fixed )
00089                                 label = QLabel( separator )
00090                                 label.setText( caption )
00091                                 font = label.font()
00092                                 font.setBold( True )
00093                                 label.setFont( font )
00094                                 line = QFrame( separator )
00095                                 line.setFrameShape( QFrame.HLine )
00096                                 line.setFrameShadow( QFrame.Plain )
00097                                 layout = QVBoxLayout( separator )
00098                                 layout.addWidget( label )
00099                                 layout.addWidget( line )
00100 
00101                                 self.view.addStateWidget( separator, attrs.get('attrs'), attrs.get('states') )
00102                                 container.addWidget( separator, attrs )
00103 
00104                         elif node.localName=='label':
00105                                 text = attrs.get('string', '')
00106                                 if not text:
00107                                         for node in node.childNodes:
00108                                                 if node.nodeType == node.TEXT_NODE:
00109                                                         text += node.data
00110                                                 else:
00111                                                         text += node.toxml()
00112                                 label = QLabel( text, container )
00113                                 label.setWordWrap( True )
00114                                 label.setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy.Expanding, QSizePolicy.Fixed )
00115                                 container.addWidget(label, attrs)
00116 
00117                         elif node.localName=='newline':
00118                                 container.newRow()
00119 
00120                         elif node.localName=='button':
00121                                 button = FieldWidgetFactory.create( 'button', container, self.view, attrs )
00122                                 if not self.isWidgetVisible( attrs ):
00123                                         continue
00124                                 name = attrs.get('name', 'unnamed')
00125                                 self.view.widgets[name] = button
00126                                 self.view.addStateWidget( button, attrs.get('attrs'), attrs.get('states') )
00127                                 container.addWidget(button, attrs)
00128 
00129                         elif node.localName=='notebook':
00130                                 if not self.isWidgetVisible( attrs ):
00131                                         continue
00132                                 tab = QTabWidget( container )
00133                                 if attrs and 'tabpos' in attrs:
00134                                         pos = { 
00135                                                 'up': QTabWidget.North,
00136                                                 'down':QTabWidget.South,
00137                                                 'left':QTabWidget.West,
00138                                                 'right':QTabWidget.East
00139                                         } [attrs['tabpos']]
00140                                 else:
00141                                         pos = {
00142                                                 'left': QTabWidget.West,
00143                                                 'top': QTabWidget.North,
00144                                                 'right': QTabWidget.East,
00145                                                 'bottom': QTabWidget.South
00146                                         } [Options.options['tabs_position']]
00147                                         
00148                                 tab.setTabPosition( pos )
00149 
00150                                 attrs['colspan'] = attrs.get('colspan', 3)
00151                                 
00152                                 container.addWidget(tab, attrs)
00153                                 
00154                                 # We pass a container because othewise a new container would 
00155                                 # be created by parse() and we don't want that because the tab
00156                                 # itself doesn't have a container: it's each of it's pages
00157                                 # that will have a container.
00158                                 _ , onWriteFunction = self.parse(node, fields, tab, container)
00159 
00160                         elif node.localName=='page':
00161                                 if not self.isWidgetVisible( attrs ):
00162                                         continue
00163                                 widget, onWriteFunction = self.parse(node, fields, notebook )
00164                                 # Mark the container as the main widget in a Tab. This way
00165                                 # we can enable/disable the whole tab easily.
00166                                 widget.isTab = True
00167                                 self.view.addStateWidget( widget, attrs.get('attrs'), attrs.get('states') )
00168 
00169                                 widget.expand()
00170                                 notebook.addTab( widget, Common.normalizeLabel( attrs.get('string', '') ) )
00171 
00172                         elif node.localName =='hpaned':
00173                                 widget = QSplitter( Qt.Horizontal, container )
00174 
00175                                 container.addWidget(widget, attrs)
00176                                 self.parse( node, fields, widget, container)
00177 
00178                         elif node.localName =='vpaned':
00179                                 widget = QSplitter( Qt.Vertical, container )
00180 
00181                                 container.addWidget(widget, attrs)
00182                                 self.parse( node, fields, widget, container)
00183 
00184                         elif node.localName == 'child1':
00185                                 widget, onWriteFunction = self.parse( node, fields )
00186                                 notebook.addWidget( widget )
00187 
00188                         elif node.localName == 'child2':
00189                                 widget, onWriteFunction = self.parse( node, fields )
00190                                 notebook.addWidget( widget )
00191 
00192                         elif node.localName =='action':
00193                                 name = str(attrs['name'])
00194                                 widget = FieldWidgetFactory.create( 'action', container, self.view, attrs )
00195                                 attrs['colspan'] = attrs.get('colspan', 3)
00196                                 self.view.widgets[name] = widget 
00197                                 container.addWidget(widget, attrs)
00198 
00199                         elif node.localName=='field':
00200                                 if not self.isWidgetVisible( attrs ):
00201                                         continue
00202                                 name = attrs['name']
00203                                 del attrs['name']
00204                                 type = attrs.get('widget', fields[name]['type'])
00205                                 fields[name].update(attrs)
00206                                 fields[name]['model'] = self.viewModel
00207 
00208                                 # Create the appropiate widget for the given field type
00209                                 widget = FieldWidgetFactory.create( type, container, self.view, fields[name] )
00210                                 if not widget:
00211                                         continue
00212 
00213                                 fields[name]['name'] = name
00214                                 if self.filter:
00215                                         widget.node = node
00216                                         self.widgetList.append(widget)
00217 
00218 
00219                                 label = None
00220                                 if not int(attrs.get('nolabel', 0)):
00221                                         label = fields[name]['string']+' :'
00222                                         
00223                                 self.view.widgets[name] = widget
00224                                 #attrs['colspan'] = int(attrs.get('colspan', widgets_type[ type ][1]))
00225 
00226                                 if not 'help' in attrs:
00227                                         attrs['help'] = fields[name].get('help', False)
00228 
00229                                 container.addWidget(widget, attrs, label)
00230 
00231                         elif node.localName=='group':
00232                                 if not self.isWidgetVisible( attrs ):
00233                                         continue
00234                                 widget, onWriteFunction = self.parse( node, fields, notebook )
00235                                 if 'string' in attrs:
00236                                         group = QGroupBox( notebook )
00237                                         group.setTitle( attrs['string'] )
00238                                         layout = QHBoxLayout( group )
00239                                         layout.addWidget( widget )
00240                                         widget = group
00241                                 
00242                                 self.view.addStateWidget( widget, attrs.get('attrs'), attrs.get('states') )
00243                                 # We don't expand the widget in 'group' as it should be 
00244                                 # automatically expanded when new rows are added to the grid.
00245                                 # See FormContainer.newRow()
00246                                 container.addWidget( widget, attrs )
00247 
00248                 return  container, onWriteFunction
00249 
00250         def isWidgetVisible(self, attributes):
00251                 value = attributes.get('invisible')
00252                 if not value:
00253                         return True
00254                 return not eval(value, {'context':self.context})
00255
